script.talk: The acute pain comes from the lower part of my body “wakes” me up. My consciousness hovers around me for seconds, finally it drops in my empty brain.
Why did you take me here?
Don't you remember? You crazily put the mechanical legs to me...
Do you know how terrified and despairing I am? But whatever, you are my hostage now.
What do you want to do?
Tit for Tat. I also want you to have the feeling of being mechanized!
Also, like god will always leave you a door. I give you a chance to save your self.
There are clues in this bedroom. If you can find them, then you can live. Otherwise.... hhhhhh
